rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: A welcoming entrance with ample lighting and open space.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Central living area adjacent to the courtyard for natural light and ventilation. Includes a home theater screen section.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Adjacent to the kitchen and living room with large windows for ample daylight.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Modern kitchen design with proper ventilation and efficient layout.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom 1
rooms.description: Well-ventilated guest room with natural light access.

rooms.name: Family Room (Joint Family Common Space)
rooms.description: Multipurpose room for family gatherings with ample ventilation and lighting.

openings.description: Large entrance door ensuring smooth flow of energy according to Vastu principles.
Auxiliary entry for service and delivery, enhancing natural light distribution.

notes: Central Courtyard: Designed in the heart of the plot, providing a private open space with greenery, aiding in natural ventilation and lighting.
Home Theater: Integrated into the living room area on the ground floor to serve as an entertainment hub while maintaining privacy.

Industrial Style & G+2 4BHK: The design accommodates joint family requirements through multiple living spaces and a multi-level structure. Industrial elements are subtly integrated in finishes and materials.
Plot Dimensions: 80x100 feet plot, ensuring optimal layout for natural light and adherence to local building norms and Vastu principles.
